name: Sein (madaoxxj)
description:
An experimental game combining platformer and visual fiction.

NO  tools,

NO  superpower,

ACT  as  a  resilient ball,

USE  your hand and mind.

A GAME,

A PLAY,

A POLYPHONY,

A DISCUSSION ABOUT ONTOLOGY,

A THOUGHT ABOUT BEING TOWARDS THE WORLD.

-

Game Designer - madao,

Artist - madao,

Programmer - Qian He （何乾）

-

Inspired by 

Virginia Woolf, Umberto Eco,

Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche, Martin Heidegger

and Andrei Tarkovsky.
